duties_responsibilities.duty: Set availability and maintainability targets for new designs and provide feedback to development projects based on field performance analysis.
Support factory, field, & project teams via material notification/ issue resolution, parts usage analysis and resolution, tracking, and reporting on field failures and issues.
Responsible for updating and extending own and local Field Service Engineer knowledge, initiate and contribute to providing material for technical service documentation and training.
Identify structural problems and possible improvements and address them within the organization. Keep up-to-date with developments and trends internal to the industry.
Attend training courses to stay up to date with new technology and programs available. Typical business hours with international travel up to 10%.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s or above in Sciences, Languages, Engineering, or Technology (6 years of experience required)
